sourcesContent:
<template>
<main-header>Редактирование ивента</main-header>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';
export default {
 name: 'edit-event-page',

 methods: {
  getEvent() {
   this.event = this.EVENTS[this.$route.params['id']-1]
  },
 },

 computed: {
  ...mapGetter ([
  'EVENTS',
  ]),
 },

 mounted() {
  this.getEvent()
 }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
